main_definition: Nextel is a brand name of low-power, short-range cellular telephone systems primarily used by government agencies and businesses.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A type of mobile communication system
meanings_and_examples.example: The police department uses Nextel phones to communicate during operations.
My neighbor's truck is equipped with a Nextel phone, allowing him to make calls in remote areas without draining the battery quickly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A brand of radios commonly used by emergency responders and military personnel
meanings_and_examples.example: During natural disasters, FEMA teams use Nextel radios for efficient communication between team members.
